category-def.name: m2e plugins
category-def.label: m2e plugins
category-def.description:
Allows to configure the path to external annotations for the Maven Dependencies and JRE containers. See http://help.eclipse.org/mars/topic/org.eclipse.jdt.doc.user/tasks/task-using_external_null_annotations.htm
The path is taken from the "m2e.jdt.annotationpath" property in POM files if it exists.
